* Eclipse

* plugin Maven : IAM
 

Pour en savoir plus : 

** http://maven.apache.org/eclipse-plugin.html

** http://code.google.com/p/q4e/wiki/Installation

** http://www.eclipse.org/iam/ 

Go to Help - Software Updates - Available Software

Click on Manage Sites - Add and add the Eclipse IAM update site at http://q4e.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/updatesite-iam/

Make sure you also have checked in the Manage Sites menu these update sites to download some dependencies if needed

    * EMF Update Site http://download.eclipse.org/modeling/emft/updates/releases/ (this has been updated for 0.10.0, and is required for Eclipse 3.4 -Ganymede-)
    * Web Tools (WTP) Update Site http://download.eclipse.org/webtools/updates/ (If installing IAM on Eclipse 3.4 -Ganymede-, use the Web Tools (WTP) Update Site found under the Ganymede Update Site.)
    * If installing IAM on Eclipse 3.4.1, install Graphical Editing Framework (GEF) found under the Ganymede Update Site.
